repos.name: casdk-harness
repos.description: A Dockerized framework for building autonomous development agents with the Claude Agent SDK. Supports interactive chat mode, autonomous spec-driven development, multi-agent orchestration via Redis, plugin system with skills/commands/hooks, MCP server integration, and Prometheus/Grafana monitoring. Written in Python.

assets.description: Comprehensive technical documentation for Claude's operational context including architecture diagrams, module descriptions, plugin system details, multi-agent architecture, and configuration reference
Claude Code project settings with detailed permission allow/deny lists for Bash commands, MCP server enablement, and tool access controls
MCP server configuration for Playwright and Puppeteer subprocess servers for browser automation

Comprehensive Makefile with 40+ targets covering build, deploy, interactive/autonomous modes, testing (unit/integration/multi-agent), code quality (lint/format/typecheck), monitoring, SSH setup, CI/CD, backup/restore, and diagnostics (doctor command)
Multi-stage Docker build (base, deps, dev, builder, prod) for the main agent container with Python 3.12+
Base Docker Compose configuration for main-agent, Prometheus, and Grafana services
Development overlay for Docker Compose with hot-reload and development settings
Production overlay for Docker Compose with production-ready settings

repos.name: claude-ui
repos.description: A fully functional clone of claude.ai built with React 18, Vite, Node.js/Express, and SQLite. Features streaming chat, artifact rendering (code/HTML/SVG/React/Mermaid), conversation management, project organization, model selection, theming, and authentication. Designed as a self-hosted alternative to claude.ai.

assets.description: Comprehensive documentation covering architecture, features (chat, artifacts, projects, models), tech stack, design system, and API routes

Frontend package config with React 18, Vite, Tailwind CSS, react-markdown, mermaid, i18next, and syntax highlighting deps

repos.name: gastown
repos.description: Multi-agent orchestration system for Claude Code with persistent work tracking. A Go-based workspace manager coordinating 20-30+ agents via git-backed hooks, convoy work tracking, beads issue system, and the Mayor AI coordinator pattern. Supports Claude Code, Codex, Gemini, Cursor, and more.

assets.description: Comprehensive documentation covering architecture (Mayor, Rigs, Crews, Polecats, Hooks, Convoys), workflows (MEOW pattern), beads formulas, runtime configuration, and the propulsion principle
Agent instructions stub pointing to CLAUDE.md for full context, with recovery instructions for gt prime
Session handoff skill for cycling Claude sessions while preserving work context via hooks and mail. Includes implementation instructions for gt handoff command
Go build system with version ldflags, code generation, macOS code signing, install to ~/.local/bin, clean, and test targets
Main entry point for the gt CLI binary
GitHub Actions CI pipeline with .beads change checks, embedded formula verification, Go tests with coverage, golangci-lint, integration tests, and PR coverage commenting
GitHub Actions release workflow for automated builds and publishing
Integration test workflow for end-to-end validation
Workflow to block PRs from internal branches to prevent accidental merges

GoReleaser configuration for cross-platform builds (Linux amd64/arm64, macOS amd64/arm64, Windows amd64, FreeBSD), archives, checksums, changelogs, and GitHub releases with Homebrew and npm install instructions

repos.name: planning-with-files
repos.description: A multi-IDE plugin implementing Manus-style file-based planning for AI coding agents. Creates persistent markdown files (task_plan.md, findings.md, progress.md) as working memory on disk. Supports 14 IDEs including Claude Code, Cursor, Gemini CLI, Kiro, Continue, Codex, and more. Includes hooks for PreToolUse, PostToolUse, and Stop lifecycle events.

assets.description: Comprehensive documentation covering the Manus-style planning pattern, 14 IDE integrations, 3-file pattern (task_plan/findings/progress), session recovery, hooks, and community forks
Claude Code plugin manifest with name, version, description, author, keywords, and repository metadata
Claude Code marketplace registration with owner info and plugin source mapping
Primary Claude Code skill definition with hooks (PreToolUse, PostToolUse, Stop), session recovery, 3-file pattern rules, 2-action rule, 3-strike error protocol, and anti-patterns. Version 2.10.0
Real-world examples of the planning-with-files pattern in action
Reference documentation for Manus principles and context engineering patterns
Template for task planning file with phases, progress checkboxes, and error logging
Template for research findings and discovery storage
Template for session logging and test result tracking

Bash script for Stop hook - verifies all phases are complete before allowing session end
